snippet.title: Ladybug
snippet.description: Ladybug Get from the start to the finish line while avoiding collision with the obstacles in the way.

snippet.title: Cosmic Crush
snippet.description: Cosmic Crush You are a small rock, collide with smaller planets to grow, but avoid the gravity of large planets.

snippet.title: Color Infection 2
snippet.description: Color Infection 2 Infect all yellow balls with the brown color by colliding them with brown balls, but don't infect green balls.

snippet.title: Collider
snippet.description: Collider Physics based puzzle game. Remove all balls by colliding the positive and negative particle balls.

snippet.title: Wicky Woo in Lava Land
snippet.description: Wicky Woo in Lava Land NOTE: the original size 672x544 must be used for the collision to work correctly!

snippet.title: Alter
snippet.description: Alter Platform puzzle game. Planets have collided, grow and shrink objects to help the villagers.
